name: Subscriber
comment: Represents  end users / service who subscribe to the products or services offered by the service provider.
vf short description: Represents  end users / service who subscribe to the products or services offered by the service provider.

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: SubscriberKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the subscribers in ALDM. Each subscriber key value represents a unique subscriber. Generated key based on CRM Subscriber Id

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberBirthDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date of birth of the subscribers primary contact. Denormalize Birth Date from Contact based on Main Contact Key.

fields.name: SubscriberFirstName
fields.comment: Specifies the first Name of the primary contact associated with the subscriber. Denormalize First Name from Contact based on Main Contact Key.

fields.name: SubscriberMiddleName
fields.comment: Middle name of the primary contact associated with the subscriber. Denormalize Middle Name from Contact based on Main Contact Key.

fields.name: SubscriberLastName
fields.comment: Last name of the primary contact associated with the subscriber. Denormalize Last Name from Contact based on Main Contact Key.

fields.name: SubscriberTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: SubscriberConvergedStatusSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: LanguageSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainContactSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PreviousSubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusReasonSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key

fields.name: SubscriberConvergedStatusReasonSK
fields.comment: BI field: AI surrogate key for converged attribute

fields.name: SalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the logical date on which the current subscriber status becomes effective.

fields.name: SubscriberConvergedStatusDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date when the converged status changed.

fields.name: PrimaryResourceTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PrimaryResourceValue
fields.comment: Indicates the value of the primary resource associated with the subscriber.For example, MSISDN and user name. Fetch (P2).product.characteristic.value from Product (P1), Product (P2) where (P2).product.characteristic.characteristicMetadata.metatype = "ResourceManagement" and (P2).product.characteristic.characteristicMetadata.name = "billingResource" and (P2).product.characteristic.characteristicMetadata.value = "True" and (P2).product.primaryProductId = (P1).product.id and (P1).product.id = Subscriber Id

fields.name: ActivationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which subscriber was activated. Product.activationDate

fields.name: OriginalActivationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the original activation date of the  subscriber.This date will be different than the activation date when the subscriber migrates to a different customer. The Original Activation Date represents the activation date of the subscriber before migration.

fields.name: AcquisitionCampaignSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CalculatedPaymentCategorySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MigrationType
fields.comment: Indicates the migration type of the subscriber.Example values are:Pre-Post - Migrated from Prepaid to PostPaidPost-Pre - Migrated from PostPaid to Prepaid //Customized per implementation.

fields.name: PortationType
fields.comment: Indicates the type of the subscriber s number portability.Example values are:In - Port inOut - Port outNone - Not ported //Customized per implementation.

fields.name: PortationDate
fields.comment: Date when the number portation of the subscriber happened. //Customized per implementation.

fields.name: PortationOperatorSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CountrySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: StateSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceProviderSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MainAddressSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CmSubscriberId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the subscribers in the source system.

fields.name: OrganizationUnitSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CrmSubscriberId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the subscriber within CRM. Product.id

fields.name: DealerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was created in the source system Product.createdOn //Customization Instruction: validate during implementation.

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system Product.lastModifiedOn //Customization Instruction: validate during implementation.

fields.name: ExternalId
fields.comment: An external identifier of the subscriber. This attribute is used if the subscriber is also present in the external systems. //Customized per implementation.

fields.name: ProductLineOfBusinessSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PreviousPaymentCategorySK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusReasonCode
fields.comment: Indicates the reason for the subscriber status. Lookup on OrderItem for OrderItem.modifyReason.name based on product.orderItemId=orderItem.id

fields.name: LastActivityCode
fields.comment: Indicates the last activity that resulted in the change of subscriber status. Lookup on OrderItem for OrderItem.action based on product.orderitemid=orderitem.id

fields.name: UserGroupSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberSequenceNumber
fields.comment: Indicates the subscriber sequence number. This number is incremented each time, the history information is logged from this table to the Subscriber History table.

fields.name: NextSubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SubscriberStatusIssueDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the status was changed. If the status change was backdated, this field contains the current logical date.

fields.name: BusinessGroupSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CustomerSiteSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FrameworkAgreementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: CampaignExperienceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: FinancialAccountSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ContractStartDate
fields.comment: Date when the current contract starts

fields.name: ContractEndDate
fields.comment: Defines length of the contract period in month

fields.name: ContractDuration
fields.comment: Date when the current contract starts

fields.name: MainOfferChangeCount
fields.comment: Defines how many times subscriber changed the main offer .

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
